title: Dave Roberts on Mindset of a Comeback & Importance of Managing Relationships
itunes:title: Dave Roberts on Mindset of a Comeback & Importance of Managing Relationships
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys are joined by Dodgers manager Dave Roberts as he talks about adding players even after a good season, the mindset of a comeback while specifically referring to his playing days with the Boston Red Sox, the importance of managing relationships with players, how to bounce back from tough losses and he answers which Dodger would make the best NFL player (2:25). After that, the pair react to the main points from Roberts' interview and they expand on what they learned from it (23:11).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
